comments: Stewart (DET) places his hands on Jackson (IND) as the latter goes to set the screen and extends slightly but there is no impact to Jackson's FOM.
Stewart (DET) is deemed to be in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Hield (IND) legally contests Bey (DET) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Joseph (DET) backs into the lower body of Jackson (IND) and the contact causes Jackson to lose his position on the floor during the rebounding opportunity.
Stewart (DET) has an arm out as he establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Hield (IND) but the contact during the screen is only marginal and does not impact Hield's play.

Stewart (DET) rolls into the paint and stops and establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Jackson (IND). Stewarts briefly brings his hands to the sides of Jackson but the marginal contact does not inhibit Jackson's movement during the screen.
Cunningham (DET) moves laterally along the path of Brogdon (IND) during the drive and the contact is incidental.

Stewart (DET) places a marginal hand to the body of Brogdon (IND) as the latter goes into the air during the driving shot attempt.  Following the release of the shot attempt, Stewart extends his arm into Brogdon's body but the contact does not affect his shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Brogdon (IND) and briefly places and removes his hands from Brogdon's body and the contact is marginal.
Jackson (IND) briefly brings his left arm across the chest of Stewart (DET) as they jostle for position but the contact is marginal Stewart is quick to abandon the post up attempt.
Stewart (DET) and Jackson (IND) jostle for positioning during the rebound but the contact is only marginal.
Stewart (DET) legally contests the perimeter jump shot attempt from Haliburton (IND).
Olynyk (DET) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Brogdon (IND) and turns his body at the end of the screen but the contact to the trailing defender is marginal.
Brogdon (IND) wraps his right arm around Grant (DET) and the contact impacts Grant's balance as he protects the ball.
Brogdon (IND) takes fewer than three steps after he has gathered the ball.
Brogdon (IND) commits a take foul on Bey (DET).
